ygData.subject: Re: Malachite in Qeynos? NO MORE?!?!
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe it also has a lot to do with your charisma as well as your faction standings, and YES, your race/Class. Jay S Howard Technical Recruiter
ygData.messageBody:
I believe it also has a lot to do with your charisma as well as your faction
standings, and YES, your race/Class.

Jay S Howard
Technical Recruiter
jhoward@...
http://www.arristech.com
602-957-3787

-->Subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] Malachite in Qeynos? NO MORE?!?!

-->From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>

-->According to Jay Howard:
-->> It is not so much the fact the cost is more overall for
-->everyone there, but
-->> for YOU. I can buy food cheap in Halas, but when I go to
-->Surefall, the
-->> prices are THROUGH THE ROOF! It is cheaper for me to pay
-->people to buy my
-->> food for me and I still save money over what the Vendor charges.
-->
-->It happens everywhere. One of my human monk friends got upset when he
-->came to Faydwer on visit about the prices. So we stood side
-->to side and
-->compared.
-->
-->Merchants are racists. Even in your guildhouse do they rip
-->you. Over the
-->8th level spells, I spare almost a platinum by going back to Felwithe
-->over the Freeport prices.
-->
